pages.text: $(li)The Cleaver of Beheading is a very sharp, big and heavy broadsword.$(br)$(li)It can only be dropped by a $(l:patchouli:illagers/executioner)Executioner$(/l).$(br)$(li)This weapon can be repaired with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/iron_ingot)Iron Ingots$(/l) in an $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/anvil)Anvil$(/l).
